name: The White Chamber
storyline: The white chamber, is a sci-fi point and click horror adventure game. Explore a strange environment crafted in luscious 2D. Control a trapped young woman who wakes in a strange environment with no memory of who she is and how she got there. As you explore a twisted space station you must solve devious puzzles and face your darkest nightmare. As you uncover the secrets of what happened, you move ever closer to the strange presence coming from the white chamber.
summary: White Chamber is an anime-style space-horror downloadable adventure game available for free. It contains multiple endings.
